scene:
Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town
Corel Mountains North Corel The Ropeway
Cloud the others make their way through the Corel Mountains. On the way up Mt. Corel, they run across an old man. Old ManWhew!!Hey!You're actually talking to me. CloudWhat is it? Old ManI just passed a guy in a black cloak back there.I just tried to tell him that it's dangerous up ahead, and he ignored me! CloudSephiroth...
Barret............ahh. AerithThere was a black-cloaked guy here, too? TifaLet's hurry on. Red XIIIHmm...... I'm moving on ahead... YuffieOh gawd, what a drag!!
Old ManIt's dangerous up ahead. Be careful on your way.If any strangers should greet you warmly while traveling, make sure to greet them back.Whew! I guess that's the fun of being on the road. Cloud and his party continue up Mt. Corel and on past the Mako reactor. They follow the train tracks through the mountains and find the others gathered near a raised bridge.
AerithCloud!!I was just wishing you were here!Unless someone lets down the bridge, we're stuck.Cloud should be able to do something.But let's take a breather first. TifaOH!! Cloud! That's it!We can't go on until the bridge is let down.I think there's a switch in that shack over there...But there's too many monsters around and I'm beat... Red XIIIWha? Oh, it's you.There seems to be an instrument in that hut that manipulates this bridge.Perhaps it's best if we rest a moment.
An arrow appears, pointing to the shack and proclaiming, "The shack is here!! (^^);" AerithCome on, Cloud. Let's rest a minute. CloudOk, then...- PHS- Let's move on! Barret......whew! AerithI'm sure glad I'm with you, Cloud! TifaI'm beat... Red XIIIWhat...? YuffieI'm pooped! Cloud heads for the shack. If Aerith or Tifa are not in the party, they start jumping up and down as Cloud passes on the track above. AerithOh, Cloud!! Good Luck!! TifaCloud!! Go Cloud!! Go!! Further down, Cloud enters the tiny shack. CloudOW!! Sure is tight in here...Come on, Cloud, don't let it get to you. Let's see... this is it.Maybe if I turn this......something should happen.- Do it- Leave it Cloud turns the switch, and the others run across the bridge to go on ahead. Climbing up from near the shack, the party finds a bird's nest full of Phoenix Down.
BarretHaaeyy! AerithHow cute!! TifaYes!! ...how cute. YuffieYeow! What a rock!! Red XIIIhuff... huff...
CloudWhat should we do?- Take the damn treasure- Leave it where it is
Take the damn treasure Times are tough... I'm taking the treasure.
BarretHaeey!! Baaeby!! AerithCloud...... TifaOh! Cloud! Your hair looks like a Chocobo! Red XIIIGlu... glug...! YuffieCome to mommy!!
Cloud and the others fight the mother Cokatolis. Received 10 "Phoenix Down"!
Leave it where it is ...it's got nothing to do with us. Just forget about it.
BarretHaeey!! Baaeby!! AerithCloud...... TifaRight! That was admirable of you. Red XIIIGlu... glug...! YuffieYou kiddin'?
They return to cross the bridge and move on. Inside a cave, there's a man lying in his bulldozer. ManHey! How'd you ever wind up around here?Look, I'm sorry but, I can't do a thing for you!Oh boy!! Corel sure has gone to pot. It used to be a famous coal mining town!They say there were more jobs than you could shake a...Well, you get the picture!Now, it's nothing but a miserable pit! Me, my bulldozer... everything's out of work.Got no job... I can't even show my face. 'Bout all that's left for me is to just live in this hole all day. The train tracks eventually dead-end into the camp of North Corel.
If Barret is in the party... ManYou, you're...Hey!! He's back! He runs off. BarretWait here... Barret walks over to where a trio of men have gathered. One of them punches him. MenWell, lookey here! Never thought I'd ever see your face again.Those people over there, they with you?Well, I feel sorry for 'em! Hangin' around a walkin' death sentence like Barret.
If Barret is not in the party... Cloud and the others find him already accosted by the three men. One of them punches him. MenWell, lookey here! Never thought I'd ever see your face again.They kick you out of another town or somethin'?You destroy everything you touch.
MenYou got a lot of balls comin' back here!Look at this place! It's all your fault North Corel turned into a garbage heap!Why doncha say something!?Or did ya forget what you done here already? Barret...I'm sorry... Man^%$#! You ain't even worth the effort.Don't waste your time talkin' to that Techno-freak! The three men nod and disperse. Barret walks back to the others. BarretYou heard 'em... It's my fault this town was... destroyed... They let it be and continue through the town. Big ManYOU know who's responsible for North Corel winding up like this! ManGet out of the way!!The only way we can make ends meet around here now is by collecting junk! Inside a tent... Old ManThe next train's coming in soon. Black WomanGrandpa used to be a Coal Train engineer.He still can't kick his old habits from then. Inside another tent... ManI want to leave this garbage dump of a town behind me, and start a new life.If I had a buggy, I'd cross the southern desert, and go to that town across the river... WomanEveryone knows that accident couldn't have been avoided.But no one will be satisfied until someone takes the blame. KidThere was something glowing in that well over there.If I can get my hands on it, I'm gonna sell it and go to the Gold Saucer! Tool ShopkeeperPlease buy something! Anything will do! General Store ShopkeeperWhat do you want? Cloud- Buy- Listen to your story- Not interested General Store Shopkeeper (when asked for a story)Take that road on the left to the Ropeway station!The Ropeway'll take you to the Gold Saucer.It don't mean much to us poor folks though... Weapon ShopkeeperIf you want to survive, then you're gonna need some of my weapons. In the house made of scrap... ManHow am I supposed to continue living in a town that's lost everything...?To hell with the Mako reactor! WomanBecause of them...... ugh. My husband got into that accident... He used to be such a strong man... Little GirlYaaay!! What do you wanna play? Back outside... Man in HardhatI hear it's a big fad now in the city to get tattoos. Is that right? Cloud- I wouldn't know- That's right
I wouldn't know Man in HardhatReally...? I saw a big '1' on the arm of a young guy heading towards the Ropeway. That Black Cape he had on was really cool.
That's right Man in HardhatI guess I should get a '0' tattoo! For a poor man like me, '0' oughtta be perfect.
Cloud the others continue to the ropeway station. AerithBarret, what happened? BarretSorry. CloudWhat happened? BarretMy hometown used to be around here. Red XIIIWhat do you mean 'used to'? BarretIt ain't here no more. Heard it got buried... in just 4 years. AerithBut how could those people say those terrible things? BarretAn' it's my fault. ALL my fault. Flashback to the town of Corel. A Shinra soldier stands guard outside the Mayor's house as townspeople hurry inside. Barret (narrating)...My hometown, Corel's always been a coal mining town.It's so dusty, but calm and so poor...... a real small town, this one.That's the first time I ever heard the word "Mako Reactor" mentioned since that time... Inside the house, a group of men are gathered. Scarlet and two Shinra employees stand before them. Village HeadmanWhat are we going to do? The only one against this is Dyne... Dyne stands up. DyneI am definitely against it, no matter what. There's nothing to talk about if you're thinking of throwing away our coal!Our coal's been protected for generations. Our fathers, and theirs before them, risked their lives for it.We have no right to throw it all away so easily! BarretBut listen, Dyne. No one uses coal nowadays. It's the sign of the times. ScarletRight, everything is Mako, now.It'll be all right, Dyne. Shinra, Inc. will guarantee your livelihood once the Mako Reactor is completed. BarretListen, Dyne. I don't want my wife, Myrna, to suffer anymore. DyneI know how you feel! I feel the same way too, damn it!But even so, I won't give away our coal mines! Village HeadmanDyne... you've got to understand. Barret (narrating)That's how the Corel Reactor was built..... and completed.We all thought it would bring us an easier life. The scene changes to show Corel in flames. Barret (narrating)It happened when Dyne and I were out of town for a few days.Corel was burned down by the Shinra troops.All the townspeople... All my relatives...... Everyone... everything...... CloudShinra troops? What for!? BarretThere was an explosion at a reactor.Shinra blamed the accident on the people. Said it was done by a rebel faction. TifaThat's so terrible! BarretWell, I guess that's true. But more than Shinra, I couldn't forgive myself.Never should've gone along with the building of the reactor... TifaDon't blame yourself. We were all fooled by the promises Shinra made back then. BarretThat's why... that's why I get so pissed off!!Not only did they take advantage of me...... But I lost my wife, Myrna, too... Station ManHey everyone! If you want to go to the 'Gold Saucer', hurry and get on!Ride the Ropeway? Cloud- Go on- Don't go on
Go on CloudLet's get on. He gets on the ropeway. BarretDyne was my best friend. We was close ever since we was kids... He follows Cloud. TifaI never knew. Barret never said a thing... Aerith......... Red XIII......... YuffieI'm not sympathizing with Barret! He never should have trusted Shinra, Inc. ... She gets on, and the others watch her. Tifa.........We better go on! She, Aerith, and Red XIII get on, and the ropeway leaves the station.
Don't go on BarretDyne was my best friend. We was close ever since we was kids... YuffieI'm waiting inside. She gets on the ropeway. TifaI never knew. Barret never said a thing... AerithEverything Shinra does seem to make everyone miserable... Red XIII......... BarretIt's all my fault... Station ManThe Ropeway takes you to the 'Gold Saucer'. It's free, so don't worry about it.
They eventually get on the ropeway and it leaves the station.
